column5: Great Memorial location. This 1 bedroom / 1 bathroom condo is in a courtyard setting close to shopping, restaurants, award winning Memorial schools , police and fire depts. Numerous updates in 2017: Carpet, bathroom, washer, interior paint, storm doors. There is a 1 car detatched carport and also additional parking available. Two pools and service room in the community. Easy access to Freeway, Memorial City Mall, City Centre, Galleria, Uptown, Memorial Park & Downtown.
